Package org.marinemc.settings

These are setting classes, that can be used to provide you with a nice, and easy to use - configuration file.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JSONConfig
    JSON Config Class

    Used for all internal and external configuration files used by MarineStandalone and its plugins.
    JSONFileHandler
    A File handler for the internal JSON Files
    ServerSettings
    Server settings (.properties) implementation
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JSONConfigException
    Exception thrown by the JSON Config handlers

Package org.marinemc.settings Description

These are setting classes, that can be used to provide you with a nice, and easy to use - configuration file. The main extension/language that we're using is JSON.
